Ok! For all you jack asses saying its fake and making complete douche bags out of yourselves....Do you see where it says R6 right after DVD? Do ya?  R6 is a bootleg DVD from China that is pretty much a TS.  So by bootleg standards, this is a great copy, and the best you can get right now!  In case you don't get it, let me explain in simple terms!  It      is     a     real     copy     and     it     is     labeled     correctly!             DVD-R6!       R E T A R D S

i need a good copy till the actual release. even bootleg chinese should be more legit than the average TS.

Region 6 (R6) indicates a distributors dvd release for China, now including Hong Kong. A region 6 dvd should be the same quality as a US region 1.  A TS bootleg of a movie, no matter where it comes from, is not a DVD rip. Ergo "fake" is an apt description.
